languages.text: "Арбитес порой приходится заниматься чистками — мутанты на нижних уровнях ульев быстро плодятся и часто становятся угрозой стабильности всего мира". {n}Проктор поднимает железную ладонь на уровень лица.{/n} "Уж я-то знаю, на что способны выродки".

"Sometimes, it falls to the Arbites to conduct such purges — mutants on lower hive levels breed quickly and often become a threat to the stability of the entire planet." {n}The Proctor raises his iron hand to his face.{/n} "I know only too well what these miscreants are capable of."
languages.original_text: "Арбитес порой приходится заниматься чистками — мутанты на нижних уровнях ульев быстро плодятся и часто становятся угрозой стабильности всего мира". {n}Проктор поднимает железную ладонь на уровень лица.{/n} "Уж я-то знаю, на что способны выродки".

traits.locale_text: "Sometimes it falls to the Arbites to conduct such purges — mutants on lower hive levels breed quickly and often become a threat to the stability of the entire planet." {n}The Proctor raises his iron hand to his face.{/n} "I know only too well what these miscreants are capable of."

"Sometimes it falls to the Arbites to conduct such purges — mutants on lower hive levels breed quickly and often become a threat to the stability of the entire planet." {n}The Proctor raises his iron hand to his face.{/n} "I know only too well what these miscreants are capable of."

"Sometimes, it falls to the Arbites to conduct such purges — mutants on lower hive levels breed quickly and often become a threat to the stability of the entire planet." {n}The Proctor raises his iron hand to his face.{/n} "I know only too well what these miscreants are capable of."

"Sometimes, it falls to the Arbites to conduct such purges — mutants on lower hive levels breed quickly and often become a threat to the stability of the entire planet." {n}The Proctor raises his iron hand to his face.{/n} "I know only too well what these miscreants are capable of."

"Sometimes, it falls to the Arbites to conduct such purges — mutants on lower hive levels breed quickly and often become a threat to the stability of the entire planet." {n}The Proctor raises his iron hand to his face.{/n} "I know only too well what these miscreants are capable of."

"Sometimes, it falls to the Arbites to conduct such purges — mutants on lower hive levels breed quickly and often become a threat to the stability of the entire planet." {n}The Proctor raises his iron hand to his face.{/n} "I know only too well what these miscreants are capable of."

languages.text: “有时候，法务部会负责进行大清洗。巢都底层的变种人繁殖得很快，往往会威胁到整颗行星的稳定。”{n}索罗蒙举起自己的铁手，放在眼前。{/n}“这些人渣能干出什么事情，我可太了解了。”
languages.original_text: "Sometimes, it falls to the Arbites to conduct such purges — mutants on lower hive levels breed quickly and often become a threat to the stability of the entire planet." {n}The Proctor raises his iron hand to his face.{/n} "I know only too well what these miscreants are capable of."

traits.locale_text: “有时候，法务部会负责进行大清洗。巢都底层的变种人繁殖得很快，往往会威胁到整颗行星的稳定。”{n}索罗蒙举起自己的铁手，放在眼前。{/n}“这些人渣能干出什么事情，我可太了解了。”

languages.text: «En ocasiones, es el Arbites quien debe encargarse de estas purgas; los mutantes de los niveles inferiores de las colmenas crían rápidamente y suelen convertirse en una amenaza para la estabilidad del planeta». {n}El Procurador se lleva la mano de hierro frente a los ojos.{/n} «Sé muy bien de qué son capaces esos indeseables».
languages.original_text: "Sometimes, it falls to the Arbites to conduct such purges — mutants on lower hive levels breed quickly and often become a threat to the stability of the entire planet." {n}The Proctor raises his iron hand to his face.{/n} "I know only too well what these miscreants are capable of."

traits.locale_text: «En ocasiones, es el Arbites quien debe encargarse de estas purgas; los mutantes de los niveles inferiores de las colmenas crían rápidamente y suelen convertirse en una amenaza para la estabilidad del planeta». {n}El Procurador se lleva la mano de hierro frente a los ojos.{/n} «Sé muy bien de qué son capaces esos indeseables».

languages.text: « Parfois, c'est à l'Arbites que revient la responsabilité d'effectuer de telles purges : les mutants des niveaux inférieurs des ruches se reproduisent rapidement, menaçant ainsi la stabilité de la planète entière. » {n}Le proctor se couvre le visage de sa main métallique.{/n} « Je ne sais que trop bien de quoi sont capables ces mécréants. »
languages.original_text: "Sometimes, it falls to the Arbites to conduct such purges — mutants on lower hive levels breed quickly and often become a threat to the stability of the entire planet." {n}The Proctor raises his iron hand to his face.{/n} "I know only too well what these miscreants are capable of."

traits.locale_text: « Parfois, c'est à l'Arbites que revient la responsabilité d'effectuer de telles purges : les mutants des niveaux inférieurs des ruches se reproduisent rapidement, menaçant ainsi la stabilité de la planète entière. » {n}Le proctor se couvre le visage de sa main métallique.{/n} « Je ne sais que trop bien de quoi sont capables ces mécréants. »

languages.text: 「時々、こうした粛清を行うのは高等裁定局の役目となります。下層ハイヴの変異体どもは繁殖が早く、惑星全体の安定を脅かす脅威となることもありますから」{n}代理人は鉄の手を己の顔に近づけながら言った。{/n}「奴らの悪行を、私は嫌というほど知っています」
languages.original_text: "Sometimes, it falls to the Arbites to conduct such purges — mutants on lower hive levels breed quickly and often become a threat to the stability of the entire planet." {n}The Proctor raises his iron hand to his face.{/n} "I know only too well what these miscreants are capable of."

traits.locale_text: 「時々、こうした粛清を行うのは高等裁定局の役目となります。下層ハイヴの変異体どもは繁殖が早く、惑星全体の安定を脅かす脅威となることもありますから」{n}代理人は鉄の手を己の顔に近づけながら言った。{/n}「奴らの悪行を、私は嫌というほど知っています」

languages.text: "Bazen bu tür temizlikleri yapmak, Arbites mensuplarına düşer. Alt kovan seviyelerindeki mutantlar hızla ürer ve genellikle tüm gezegenin istikrarı için tehdit hâline gelirler." {n}Üsteğmen, demir elini yüzüne kaldırıyor.{/n} "Bu alçakların nelere kadir olduğunu ben çok iyi bilirim."
languages.original_text: "Sometimes, it falls to the Arbites to conduct such purges — mutants on lower hive levels breed quickly and often become a threat to the stability of the entire planet." {n}The Proctor raises his iron hand to his face.{/n} "I know only too well what these miscreants are capable of."

traits.locale_text: "Bazen bu tür temizlikleri yapmak Arbites mensuplarına düşer. Alt kovan seviyelerindeki mutantlar hızla ürer ve genellikle tüm gezegenin istikrarı için bir tehdit hâline gelirler." {n}Üsteğmen, demir elini yüzüne kaldırıyor.{/n} "Bu alçakların nelere kadir olduğunu ben çok iyi bilirim."

languages.text: "Manchmal fällt es den Arbites zu, solche Säuberungen durchzuführen – Mutanten unterer Makropolenebenen vermehren sich rasch und gefährden dadurch häufig die Stabilität des gesamten Planeten." {n}Der Proktor drückt seine Eisenhand gegen sein Gesicht.{/n} "Ich weiß nur zu gut, wozu diese Missgeburten fähig sind."
languages.original_text: "Sometimes, it falls to the Arbites to conduct such purges — mutants on lower hive levels breed quickly and often become a threat to the stability of the entire planet." {n}The Proctor raises his iron hand to his face.{/n} "I know only too well what these miscreants are capable of."

traits.locale_text: "Manchmal fällt es den Arbites zu, solche Säuberungen durchzuführen – Mutanten unterer Makropolenebenen vermehren sich rasch und gefährden dadurch häufig die Stabilität des gesamten Planeten." {n}Der Proktor drückt seine Eisenhand gegen sein Gesicht.{/n} "Ich weiß nur zu gut, wozu diese Missgeburten fähig sind."
